_header: Thou that sellest the word of God
Note: For the reply of the friars see 305.
_description: Verses against the friars — three six-line stanzas

CamStJohn195.First Lines:
Þou þat sellest þe worde of godBe þou berfot be
                    þou schod…
CamStJohn195.Last Lines:
…For money lowle ȝe lowteFlatteringe boyþe more
                    & lesse
CamStJohn195.Note:
